text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 

2019 (Commencement) Order 2022.

title: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 14 of 2019) shall, insofar
heading: 2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed to be the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 4th day of April 2022 is appointed to be the day on which the 
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 14 of 2019) shall, insofar 
as it is not already in operation, come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [167] 3

title: Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 14 of 2019) shall, insofar
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order appoints 4 April 2022 as the date on which the remaining 
provisions of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 come into 
effect. 

Specifically, section 26 and insofar as they are not already in operation, 
sections 22, 23, 24, 25 and 29 come into effect on 4 April 2022 on foot of this 
Order. 

The aforementioned provisions require the annual registration of tenancies with 
the Residential Tenancies Board (RTB) and provide for associated registration 
fees and minor technical amendments to the Residential Tenancies Act 2004. 
Section 29(b) of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 is also 
commenced requiring the Minister for Housing, Local Government and 
Heritage to report to the Houses of the Oireachtas on prevailing rent levels, 
informed by data collected via the RTB’s new annual tenancy registration 
system. 

The other provisions of the Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 were 
previously commenced under the following Statutory Instruments: 

Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 2019 
(S.I. No. 236 of 2019); 

Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (Commencement)(No. 2) Order 
2019 (S.I. No. 286 of 2019); and 

Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 (Commencement)(No. 3) Order 
2019 (S.I. No. 354 of 2019). 

Sections 25 and 26 of Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 
(No. 24 of 2019) amend the Residential Tenancies Act 2004 and the 
Residential Tenancies (Amendment) Act 2019 respectively, and the following 
Statutory Instruments refer: 

Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 
2019 (S.I. No. 355 of 2019; and 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [167] 

Local Government Rates and Other Matters Act 2019 (Commencement) Order 
2022 (S.I. No. 164 of 2022).
